column4: I made aptitude update, then apt-get install wine. It says package not found, how come's that???
you should use aptitude or apt-get not both, it can cause problems switching between to the 2
aptitude update and apt-get update is the same operation, no?

they do the same thing but aptitude uses an extented database of infomation that apt-get doesnt uses so installing programs with both may lead to problems. im just giving you advice you can use both if you want its completly up to you
